name: browserify-shim
description: Shims any module so it can be browserified even if it isn't commonJS compatible.

scripts.shim-jquery: cd examples/shim-jquery && npm install && node build.js && open index.html
scripts.shim-underscore: cd examples/shim-underscore && npm install && node build.js && open index.html

author: Thorsten Lorenz <thlorenz@gmx.de> (thlorenz.com)
